name: Notice.AAA6.CP.HearingFee.HWF.AppliedFor.Claimant
titleEn: We're reviewing your help with fees application
titleCy: Rydym yn adolygu eich cais am help i dalu ffioedd
descriptionEn: You've applied for help with the hearing fee. You'll receive an update in 5 to 10 working days.
descriptionCy: Fe wnaethoch chi gais am help i dalu ffi'r gwrandawiad. Byddwch yn cael diweddariad mewn 5 i 10 diwrnod gwaith.
